item.title: What do I need to bring to have my card produced?
item.dc:creator: PR
item.description: To obtain your Campus ID card you must have: One piece of valid government produced photo identification (BYID card, current citizenship card, driver’s license or passport); and Proof of payment (tuition or deferment receipt). If you do not have government produced photo ID print a â€˜Student Identification Formâ€™ in advance and have it completed by […]
item.content:encoded:
To obtain your Campus ID card you must have:

  • One piece of valid government produced photo identification (BYID card, current citizenship card, driver’s license or passport); and
  • Proof of payment (tuition or deferment receipt).

If you do not have government produced photo ID print a â€˜Student Identification Formâ€ in advance and have it completed by you and a guarantor prior to visiting the ID office.
